name: Tennis Titans
summary: Hit the courts for some rowdy tennis fun with seven flavorful tennis characters! Featuring simple, easy-to-learn hitting and aiming, Tennis Titans brings together a crazy crew of colorful cartoon characters who all want the same thing - to be Court Champion. Plus, two great game modes means there's more ways to win! Charming, delightful, and beautifully rendered, Tennis Titans is a challenging treat for the entire family.
